ðŸ“– Summary: daedalOS is a JavaScript-based project that emulates a desktop environment within a web browser. It offers features such as a file system with drag-and-drop support, resizable windows, a start menu, a taskbar, and customizable backgrounds, enabling users to perform typical desktop tasks directly in their browser.
